improvement: The current tool was selected only 10% of the time, indicating that it needs to be more competitive with other tools in the list. Upon reviewing the questions asked and the tools called, I noticed that users often ask for forecasts for specific locations and time periods (e.g., 'next 3 days', '13 day weather forecast'). This suggests that users value flexibility and precision in their forecasting queries. To improve the competitiveness of the current tool, I will revise its name and description to emphasize these aspects.
description: Returns a flexible daily forecast for any location, with options to specify the number of days (up to 16) and units (metric or imperial).
